name: Hide Alone
description:
'Hide Alone' is a first-person survival horror game where you survive for a limited time.
It is a story that takes place when the protagonist, who is usually interested in supernatural phenomena, becomes interested in the dangerous game of hide and seek, which can only be played at 3 am.
This dangerous game requires no one in the house and only you and your doll play hide and seek.
At 3am the doll comes to life, and you have to turn off all the lights and rely on your lighter in the dark.
There are rules to follow when playing hide-and-seek, and breaking even one of these rules can put your life at risk.
Therefore, you will need to familiarize yourself with the rules and be careful not to get caught by them.

WARNING: If you are playing this game for the first time, please be aware that you may find the game difficult and may require repeated failures.

HAUNTED DOLL


When hide and seek begins, a haunted doll will wander around looking for you.

FIND ITEM


You will have to find the items you need to survive in the dark.

CURSING GIRL


The girl who curses you will keep following you.

FOLLOW THE RULES


If you want to finish hide and seek safely, you must follow the rules.
